title: Don’t trust public WiFi networks, no matter how cute they are [CARTOON]
content: Don’t trust public WiFi networks, no matter how cute they are [CARTOON] Cartoon by Phil Johnson for MIT June, apparently, is Internet Security Month! In honor of that, here’s a friendly reminder to be careful when using public (i.e., non-secure) WiFi networks. It’s a good idea to use a VPN in that case to protect your data from bad folks. Now go forth and enjoy that beverage and the free WiFi that came with it.
